Package main

Class Cmd

java.lang.Object
main.Cmd
All Implemented Interfaces:
ManagerInterface
public class Cmd
extends java.lang.Object
implements ManagerInterface
this model implements the command line interface to play the game.
Author:
Zahid Khan

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void backToMainMenu()
    backToMainMenu() is the main screen that the user play the game from backToMainMenu() trader can travel or visit a store
    void chooseRoute​(int source, int destination)
    chooseRoute(int source, int destination) gets input from the trader.
    int chooseShip​(java.util.ArrayList<Ship> ships)
    lists all the ships for User to choose from
    boolean confirmQuit()
    confirmQuit is a interface method to be impelemented by Gui and CMD confirmQuit method is not impelemented by cmd yet but we still kept it to use it in future
    int daysToPlay()
    Prompts user to add number of days he'd like to play the game
    void eventPopUp​(int length)
    eventPopUp is a interface method to be impelemented by Gui and CMD eventPopUp method is not impelemented by cmd yet but we still kept it to use it in future
    void gameOver()
    gameOver ends the game and close the scanner gameOver prints how trader played the game it prints bought items, sold items, profit, remaining coins, remaining days.
    int getDaystoPlayGame()
    this method returns number of days to play the game
    int getHomeIslandNo()
    this method returns Users home-island
    void getItemsByCategory()
    user can choose whether to make a transaction or travel if user chooses to travel then destinationIsland method is called if user chooses to make another transaction scanTransactionType is called.
    java.lang.String geTraderName()
    this method returns user's name
    int getShipNo()
    this method returns User's ship number.
    java.lang.String getStartGame()
    once the game set up is done, getStartGame() will start the game
    void goStore()
    goStore() directs trader to store screen once trader is in store, he can purchase or sell items.
    void goTravel()
    goTravel() prints all islands for trader to choose one from.
    void printallpossilberoutes​(int source, int destination)
    printallpossilberoutes(int source, int destination) prints all possible routes from the current island to a destination island.
    void profilePage()
    profilePage() views trader's bought items, sold items, ship status, ship upgrades and there is an option ot repair the ship.
    void purchase()
    purchase() calls getItemsByCategory() which views items by its category purchase() also calls transactionProcess() which does the transaction.
    void quit()
    quit is a interface method to be impelemented by Gui and CMD quit method is not impelemented by cmd yet but we still kept it to use it in future
    void randomEvents​(int size)
    randomEvents(int) creates events randomly.
    void sell()
    sell() prints a list of bought items to choose from and sell trader must enter a valid number since sell() checks the input and validates it before selling items Trader sells items to a store in current island where his ship is docked.
    int setHomeIslandRandomly()
    this method randomly chooses a number for home island
    java.lang.String setName()
    this method prompts user to add name, and check if it's valid using the InputValidation class.
    void setTrader()
    setTrader() sets the trader by the details recieved from the user setTrader() sets the name, ship, days, island, homeIsland
    void setup​(GameManager gameManager)
    setup is a interface method to be impelemented by Gui and CMD setup method is not impelemented by cmd yet but we still kept it to use it in future

    starts the game

    transactionProcess() prints all available categories.

    • getItemsByCategory

      public void getItemsByCategory()
      user can choose whether to make a transaction or travel if user chooses to travel then destinationIsland method is called if user chooses to make another transaction scanTransactionType is called.

    • backToMainMenu

      public void backToMainMenu()
      backToMainMenu() is the main screen that the user play the game from backToMainMenu() trader can travel or visit a store

    • goStore

      public void goStore()
      goStore() directs trader to store screen once trader is in store, he can purchase or sell items.
      Specified by:
      goStore in interface ManagerInterface

    • purchase

      public void purchase()
      purchase() calls getItemsByCategory() which views items by its category purchase() also calls transactionProcess() which does the transaction. trader makes a purchase from a store where his ship is docked.
      Specified by:
      purchase in interface ManagerInterface

    • transactionProcess

      public void transactionProcess()
      transactionProcess() prints all available categories. Trader choose one catgory and transactionProcess() views all products within that category along with prices and available quantities trader chooses an item number to purchase transactionProcess() checks if the store has the quantity trader wants and checks if the trader has enough money. if all requirements for a transaction is met then trader can make a purchase.

    • sell

      public void sell()
      sell() prints a list of bought items to choose from and sell trader must enter a valid number since sell() checks the input and validates it before selling items Trader sells items to a store in current island where his ship is docked. trader can only sell items from his bought items list
      Specified by:
      sell in interface ManagerInterface

    • goTravel

      public void goTravel()
      goTravel() prints all islands for trader to choose one from. Trader can't travel to the current island goTravel takes input from trader. input is the number of island that trader wants to travel. goTravel() validates the input and move the trader to a new Isalnd.
      Specified by:
      goTravel in interface ManagerInterface

    • printallpossilberoutes

      public void printallpossilberoutes​(int source, int destination)
      printallpossilberoutes(int source, int destination) prints all possible routes from the current island to a destination island.
      Parameters:
      source - is the current island
      destination - is the destination island

    • randomEvents

      public void randomEvents​(int size)
      randomEvents(int) creates events randomly. Each route takes some events.
      Parameters:
      size - is the length of a route. Shorter the rout more possibility to face events but longer the route less possibility to face events.

    • chooseRoute

      public void chooseRoute​(int source, int destination)
      chooseRoute(int source, int destination) gets input from the trader. input must be a route number which trader wants to travel with. chooseRoute method also validates user's input
      Parameters:
      source - is the current island
      destination - is the destination island where trader wants to travel

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver()
      gameOver ends the game and close the scanner gameOver prints how trader played the game it prints bought items, sold items, profit, remaining coins, remaining days.
      Specified by:
      gameOver in interface ManagerInterface

    • setup

      public void setup​(GameManager gameManager)
      setup is a interface method to be impelemented by Gui and CMD setup method is not impelemented by cmd yet but we still kept it to use it in future
      Specified by:
      setup in interface ManagerInterface
      Parameters:
      gameManager - The game manager that this UI interacts with

    • confirmQuit

      public boolean confirmQuit()
      confirmQuit is a interface method to be impelemented by Gui and CMD confirmQuit method is not impelemented by cmd yet but we still kept it to use it in future
      Specified by:
      confirmQuit in interface ManagerInterface
      Returns:
      true if the user wants to quit, false otherwise
